text:
Palliative Care,GHR,mycosis fungoides
What is (are) essential pentosuria ?,"Essential pentosuria is a condition characterized by high levels of a sugar called L-xylulose in urine. The condition is so named because L-xylulose is a type of sugar called a pentose. Despite the excess sugar, affected individuals have no associated health problems.",GHR,essential pentosuria
How many people are affected by essential pentosuria ?,"Essential pentosuria occurs almost exclusively in individuals with Ashke
